FieldHistoryArchive.name: FieldHistoryArchive
FieldHistoryArchive.description: Represents field history values for all objects that retain field history. FieldHistoryArchive is a big object, available only to users with the “Retain Field History” permission.

ArchiveFieldName.description: The name of the field at the time the data was archived. If the field name changed, the name is sometimes not the same for all records related to a single field.

ArchiveParentName.description: The name of the parent object at the time the data was archived. If the object name changed, the name is sometimes not the same for all records related to a single field.

ArchiveParentType.description: The type of the field at the time the data was archived. If the field type changed, the type is sometimes not the same for all records related to a single field.

ArchiveTimestamp.description: The date and time at which the data was archived.

CreatedById.description: The user ID of the user who created the original record.

CreatedDate.description: The date and time at which the original record was created.

Field.description: The name of the field that was changed. If the field is deleted from the parent object, the Field field contains the field ID instead.

FieldHistoryType.description: The name of the object that contains the field history. Possible values are: Account Article Asset AuthorizationFormConsent – Available in version 58.0 and later. Case CommSubscriptionConsent – Available in version 58.0 and later. Contact ContactPointConsent – Available in version 58.0 and later. ContactPointTypeConsent – Available in version 58.0 and later. Contract ContractLineItem Crisis Employee EmployeeCrisisAssessment Entitlement Individual InternalOrganizationUnit Knowledge Lead Opportunity Order OrderItem PartyConsent – Available in version 58.0 and later. Pricebook2 PricebookEntry Product2 ServiceAppointment ServiceContract Solution WorkOrder WorkOrderLineItem

HistoryId.description: The ID of the relevant history object (for example, AccountHistory). This field is available in versions 42.0 and later.

Id.description: The ID of the archived record. It’s useful to have a field’s ID for fields that you’ve deleted. (Field names aren’t retained in history when you delete fields from Salesforce.)

NewValue.description: The new value of the modified field.

OldValue.description: The previous value of the modified field.

ParentId.description: The ID of the object that contains the field (the parent object).
